array.param: Who activates trigger. Can be "NONE" or Side: "EAST", "WEST", "GUER", "CIV", "LOGIC", "ANY", "ANYPLAYER" (Since Arma 3 v1.67) Radio: "ALPHA", "BRAVO", "CHARLIE", "DELTA", "ECHO", "FOXTROT", "GOLF", "HOTEL", "INDIA", "JULIET" Object: "STATIC", "VEHICLE", "GROUP", "LEADER", "MEMBER" Status: "WEST SEIZED", "EAST SEIZED" or "GUER SEIZED"
How trigger is it activated. Can be: Presence: "PRESENT", "NOT PRESENT" Detection: "WEST D", "EAST D", "GUER D" or "CIV D"
